Notes.Text:
This update for libpng16 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2026-22695: Fixed heap buffer over-read in png_image_finish_read (bsc#1256525)
Notes.Title: Details

SUSE Linux Enterprise Server LTSS Extended Security 12 SP5

Vulnerabilities.Description: LIBPNG is a reference library for use in applications that read, create, and manipulate PNG (Portable Network Graphics) raster image files. From 1.6.51 to 1.6.53, there is a heap buffer over-read in the libpng simplified API function png_image_finish_read when processing interlaced 16-bit PNGs with 8-bit output format and non-minimal row stride. This is a regression introduced by the fix for CVE-2025-65018. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.6.54.
